title: Kinda Funny at E3 2016
description:
Kinda Funny's going to E3, and we want you to come, too!

Sunday and Monday, pre and post-shows for every conference on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. Tuesday, interviews and reactions from noon to 4 p.m. on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. Wednesday and Thursday, we're doing podcasts and let's plays here on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

transcript_chunks.text: What's up everybody, it's Greg and Colin from Kinda Funny, and guess what? E3 is next week and we have a whole bunch of cool stuff for you. If you didn't know, Sunday and Monday we are doing pre- and post-shows for each and every conference. Where can you watch those, Colin? Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames. That's right, on that URL we will be there 30 minutes before every conference, 30 minutes after every conference. We'll host the conferences during them so you can watch that and get all sorts of support. The post-shows will actually be the Kinda Funny Gamescast, or in the example of the PlayStation one, PS I Love You XOXO. Uh, then guess what happens on Tuesday, Colin? Where do people watch? Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames. When we're there, we're there from noon to 4:00 PM Pacific Time. Interviews, game talk, reaction, all sorts of crazy stuff from the E3 show floor. Super exciting. Then Wednesday and Thursday we're doing something different, roaming the convention center, playing games, doing interviews, doing

reaction, all sorts of crazy stuff from the E3 show floor. Super exciting. Then Wednesday and Thursday we're doing something different, roaming the convention center, playing games, doing interviews, doing podcasts, and we're putting it all up on Lola she doesn't know she's freezing YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames. So there you go, ladies and gentlemen, we are at E3 doing a whole bunch of cool video stuff for you. We hope you'll join us. Until next time, it's been a pleasure to serve you.
